review:
Doc Jayashree is compassionate, friendly and above all is accessible at all times in times of need.
Listens to patients problems very intently and her talk and approach is very warm during stressful times.
She puts people at ease with her approach and is available for a call whenever requested and responds to requests thorough messages/ whatsapp amidst her hectic schedule.**** ********* ** **** *** above all, her motivating talk and suggestions to patients as to how to overcome stress/ disturbances especially during these pandemic times is something worth mentioning.
